articles.description: Premier League reaction and latest news as Liverpool beat Wolves & Tottenham consigned Man United to another defeat
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Liverpool beat Wolves & Tottenham beat Man Utd

articles.description: The Premier League title race is heading towards the final straight - after Liverpool edged past Wolves, how does their run-in compare to Arsenal's?
articles.title: Liverpool or Arsenal? What the stats say about the Premier League title race

articles.description: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says his job is "so hard" after defeat at Tottenham on Sunday leaves his side 15th in the Premier League.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd boss says 'my job is so hard' after Tottenham loss

articles.description: Steph Curry claims the Kobe Bryant MVP trophy and leads Shaq's OGs to the All-Star title at Chase Center in San Francisco.
articles.title: NBA All-Star: Steph Curry wins MVP and leads Shaq's OGs to All-Star title

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Micah Richards explains why new midfielder Nico Gonzalez could end up having a huge impact on what is left of Manchester City's season.
articles.title: Nico Gonzalez: Man City's 'mini-Rodri' who ‘makes a massive difference’

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Omar Marmoush, Gabriel, Chris Wood, Mikel Merino, Beto

articles.description: Sweden's Ludvig Aberg birdies four of his last six holes to claim his second PGA Tour title at the Genesis Invitational.
articles.title: PGA Tour: Sweden's Ludvig Aberg snatches victory at Genesis Invitational

articles.description: Motherwell have appointed former Austria Vienna boss Michael Wimmer as their new manager.
articles.title: Motherwell appoint Wimmer as manager

articles.description: James Maddison did his best to "block out the noise" by scoring the winner as he helped Tottenham beat Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.
articles.title: James Maddison: Was Tottenham midfielder's celebration a dig at Roy Keane?

articles.description: Sunday's La Liga match between Espanyol and Athletic Bilbao is briefly stopped over allegations a visiting player was racially abused by some fans.
articles.title: La Liga: Athletic Bilbao-Espanyol game halted over allegations of racism
